After a disastrous date, Masahiro discovers that at the train station he is being chased by a girl who keeps calling him \"daddy\".\n\n- **Ore wa Otoko da!** (おれは男だ!) - Weekly Shounen Jump Special Issue #8, 1980\nTsukasa Hojo's debut work.\nShou is the representative of the students of an all-boys high school, a faithful follower of tradition and with great animosity towards the female sex. Iwasaki is the representative of St. Carolina Academy, open-minded and progressive. 172891b3-f75a-47af-a137-e7f41333a22c:::||@!@||:::2024-07-08T01:23:40:::||@!@||:::{"id":"172891b3-f75a-47af-a137-e7f41333a22c","title":{"en":"The Great Catsby"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"위대한 캣츠비 제"},{"ko-ro":"Widaehan Kaetcheubi"},{"es":"El Gran Catsby"}],"lastChapter":"72","availableTranslatedLanguages":["es"],"description":{"en":"Catsby, twenty-something nobody, loses his girl-friend to another man. A richer man. His pal Houndu treats him to wine, women and song, but there's no forgetting the lost Persu. The thousand humiliations of youth are poured upon Catsby, who feels far too much to begin with, and whose prospects go from bad to worse.\n\nNow he's petrified by his father, now drunk on the floor, now freaking over a blind-date, now convinced it's all for nothing. And that's just volume one of this groundbreaking new series. No detail however vulgar or delicate is left out as the angst of youth is beautifully dissected.","es":"“El Gran Catsby va de juventud. Por juventud me refiero al lugar que sin duda queda en la memoria de todas y cada una de las personas. Es el lugar donde uno, a veces, sueña sin fundamento o hiere a otro sin ningún reparo.” dice Doha , el autor de este multipremiado cómic coreano. Y como la juventud, El Gran Catsby es, al mismo tiempo, triste y divertido. En una palabra: emocionante."},"links":{"al":"35713","engtl":"https://www.netcomics.com/comic/75","mal":"5713","mu":"a7izsf4","raw":"https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/위대한-캣츠비/11?tab=episode"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Маючи тільки три дні до переїзду, хлопаки зустрічають знайомі обличчя, проходячи містом і пробуджуючи темні спогади, які Санні так сильно хотів забути."},"links":{"al":"171695","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DP7Y1N9P","ap":"omori","bw":"series/498757/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/861765","engtl":"https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10607/episode/352385","kt":"72324","mal":"164732","mu":"hks6q7y","raw":"https://comic-days.com/episode/2550689798731966148"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}
